title: Investigate the source of a big perf overhead when using analyzers on big solutions.
body: Investigate (and fix if possible) ~10s difference in performance on OC rebuild using analyzers (from #9988).

nodes.body: I have created a PR that fixes the perf overhead related to loggers. However, there is still [significant difference in perf](https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/10186#issuecomment-2140041676) that we need to investigate.
